body:
This crooked staff is made of mahogany and decorated with the bones of eidolons that jut out of the wood. It allows the use of the following spells:

  • Lesser rejuvenate eidolon (1 charge)
  • Unfetter (1 charge)
  • Lesser evolution surge (2 charges)
name: Staff of Eidolons
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Eidolons
